# The OS.VKDSK disk can be programmend with the following instructions 
~~~~

org 100h
;call_Routiune
iqrl cx		;63 00 00 03 00 00 00 00
push ax		;29 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
and ax,bx	;69 00 00 01 00 00 00 02
mov dx,ax	;39 00 00 04 00 00 00 01
pop ax		;30 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
xor ax,bx	;79 00 00 01 00 00 00 02
shl dx,1	;0b 00 00 04 00 00 00 01
mov bx,dx	;39 00 00 02 00 00 00 04
cmp bx,0	;4b 00 00 02 00 00 00 00
jnz cx		;59 00 00 07 00 00 00 03
pop dx		;30 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
push ax		;29 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
jmp dx		;59 00 00 01 00 00 00 04


org 1300h
;addition
pop dx		;30 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
pop ax		;30 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
pop bx		;30 00 00 02 00 00 00 00
push dx		;29 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
iqrl cx		;63 00 00 03 00 00 00 00
push ax		;29 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
and ax,bx	;69 00 00 01 00 00 00 02
mov dx,ax	;39 00 00 04 00 00 00 01
pop ax		;30 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
xor ax,bx	;79 00 00 01 00 00 00 02
shl dx,1	;0b 00 00 04 00 00 00 01
mov bx,dx	;39 00 00 02 00 00 00 04
cmp bx,0	;4b 00 00 02 00 00 00 00
jnz cx		;59 00 00 07 00 00 00 03
pop dx		;30 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
jmp dx		;59 00 00 01 00 00 00 04


org 1400h
;multiplication 
pop dx		;30 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
pop ax		;30 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
pop bx		;30 00 00 02 00 00 00 00
push dx		;29 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
mov dx,ax	;39 00 00 04 00 00 00 01
mov ax,0	;3b 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
mov cx,1	;3b 00 00 03 00 00 00 00
nop 		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
nop		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
push cx		;29 00 00 03 00 00 00 00
and cx,bx	;69 00 00 03 00 00 00 00
cmp cx,0	;4b 00 00 03 00 00 00 00
pop cx		;30 00 00 03 00 00 00 00
je 14e0h	;5b 00 00 03 00 00 14 e0
push bx		;29 00 00 02 00 00 00 00
push dx		;29 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
push cx		;29 00 00 03 00 00 00 00
push ax		;29 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
push dx		;29 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
push 12f0h	;2b 00 12 f0 00 00 00 00
mov bx,8	;3b 00 00 02 00 00 00 08
iqrl ax		;63 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
jmp f0h		;5b 00 00 01 00 00 00 f0
nop 		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
nop		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
pop cx		;30 00 00 03 00 00 00 00
nop		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
pop dx		;30 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
pop bx		;30 00 00 02 00 00 00 00
nop 		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
nop		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
shr bx,1	;13 00 00 02 00 00 00 01
shl dx,1	;0b 00 00 04 00 00 00 01
cmp bx,0	;4b 00 00 02 00 00 00 00
jnz 1440h	;5b 00 00 07 00 00 14 40
pop dx		;30 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
jmp dx		;59 00 00 01 00 00 00 04

org 1600h
;subtraction ax-bx
pop dx		;30 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
pop ax		;30 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
pop bx		;30 00 00 02 00 00 00 00
push dx		;29 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
not bx		;43 00 00 02 00 00 00 00
push ax		;29 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
push bx		;29 00 00 02 00 00 00 00
push 1		;2b 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
push 12f0h	;2b 00 12 f0 00 00 00 00
mov bx,8	;3b 00 00 02 00 00 00 08
iqrl ax		;63 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
jmp f0h		;5b 00 00 01 00 00 00 f0
nop 		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
nop		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
push ax		;29 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
push 12f0h	;2b 00 12 f0 00 00 00 00
mov bx,8	;3b 00 00 02 00 00 00 08
iqrl ax		;63 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
jmp f0h		;5b 00 00 01 00 00 00 f0
nop 		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
nop		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
pop dx		;30 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
jmp dx		;59 00 00 01 00 00 00 04

org 1700h
;divide ax/bx
pop dx		;30 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
pop bx		;30 00 00 02 00 00 00 00
pop ax		;30 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
push dx		;29 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
mov cx,0	;3b 00 00 03 00 00 00 00
mov dx,1	;3b 00 00 04 00 00 00 01
nop		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
nop		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
cmp bx,ax	;49 00 00 02 00 00 00 01
jl 1770h	;5b 00 00 02 00 00 17 70
shl bx,1	;0b 00 00 02 00 00 00 01
shl dx,1	;0b 00 00 04 00 00 00 01
jmp 1730h	;5b 00 00 01 00 00 17 30 
nop		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
nop		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
cmp bx,ax	;49 00 00 02 00 00 00 01
jge 17b0h	;5b 00 00 06 00 00 17 b0 
shr bx,1	;13 00 00 02 00 00 00 01
shr dx,1	;13 00 00 04 00 00 00 01
cmp dx,0	;4b 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
je 1840h	;5b 00 00 03 00 00 18 40 
jmp 1770h 	;5b 00 00 01 00 00 17 70
nop		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
nop		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
push bx		;29 00 00 02 00 00 00 00
push cx		;29 00 00 03 00 00 00 00
push dx		;29 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
push ax		;29 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
push bx		;29 00 00 02 00 00 00 00
push 15e0h	;2b 00 15 e0 00 00 00 00
mov bx,8	;3b 00 00 02 00 00 00 08
iqrl ax		;63 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
jmp f0h		;5b 00 00 01 00 00 00 f0
nop 		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
nop		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
pop dx		;30 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
pop cx		;30 00 00 03 00 00 00 00
pop bx		;30 00 00 02 00 00 00 00
xor cx,dx	;79 00 00 03 00 00 00 04
jmp 17b0h	;5b 00 00 01 00 00 17 b0
nop		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
nop		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
mov bx,ax	;39 00 00 02 00 00 00 01
mov ax,cx	;39 00 00 01 00 00 00 03
pop dx		;30 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
jmp dx		;59 00 00 01 00 00 00 04


org 1900h
;mod ax%bx
pop dx		;30 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
pop bx		;30 00 00 02 00 00 00 00
pop ax		;30 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
push dx		;29 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
push ax		;29 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
push bx		;29 00 00 02 00 00 00 00
push 16E0h	;2b 00 16 e0 00 00 00 00
mov bx,8	;3b 00 00 02 00 00 00 08
iqrl ax		;63 00 00 01 00 00 00 00
jmp f0h		;5b 00 00 01 00 00 00 f0
nop 		;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
nop             ;00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
mov ax,bx	;39 00 00 01 00 00 00 02
pop dx		;30 00 00 04 00 00 00 00
jmp dx		;59 00 00 01 00 00 00 04

~~~~
